    • Constructor Detail

      • ARGuide

        public ARGuide(java.lang.String driver,
               java.lang.String connPath,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
               java.sql.SQLException,
               JSONResourceException
        Parameters:
        driver - the JDBC driver to be used (e.g "oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver")
        connPath - the connection path for your DB (e.g "localhost:1521:xe")
        username - the username of your DB account (e.g "STUDENT")
        password - the password of your DB account (e.g "STUDENT0")
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the driver class is unknown
        java.sql.SQLException - when a DB access error occurs
        JSONResourceException - upon unknown request or WSProcessor operation failure

      • selectClassroomSchedule

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectClassroomSchedule(java.lang.String classroomName)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        classroomName - the name of the classroom whose schedule should be returned
        Returns:
        the list of results w.r.t the query (i.e, a set of tuples of the form (day, starting_time, ending_time, course_name))
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on database access error
